amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-794 to direct the Secretary to expedite the Brays Bayou flood mitigation project authorized by item 6 in section 211(f) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-794 to direct the Secretary to expedite the Brays Bayou flood mitigation project authorized by item 6 in section 211(f) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Culberson.
